title: Pasta with wild mushroom sauce
description: Pasta with dairy-free wild mushroom sauce is a comforting supper made even better with wilted baby leaves.
ingredients: 2 tbsp extra-virgin olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
250ml Alpro soya dairy-free alternative to cream
100g mixture of baby leaves, such as spinach and rocket

method.Step 1: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the mushrooms for 3 minutes. Season. Keeping half the mushrooms warm, tip the remainder into a food processor. Heat the soya cream to just boiling point, then pour into the food processor and blend with the mushrooms.

method.Step 2: Cook the pasta according to the packet instructions. Drain, reserving 100ml of the cooking liquid. Return the pasta and reserved liquid to the pan, add the mushroom sauce and baby leaves. Stir until the leaves are wilted. Season. Serve topped with the reserved mushrooms. Garnish with a drizzle of oil and freshly ground pepper
